location: Wuxing Street 600 Alley, Xinyi District, near Taipei Medical University and Taipei 101
notes: Brand-new unit with simple renovation completed within 6 months. South-facing with Taipei 101 views from balcony and living areas - good natural light expected. Building by Dacin Construction (reputable listed company). For baby safety: has balcony (check railing height), but being 9th floor in elevator building is convenient. Well-equipped with appliances, near hospitals and shopping.
